casebody.data:
STEPHEN J. R.
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 3, 2018 Robert L. O'Brien, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Demise B. Smoker, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Stephen J. R.'s petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 178 Conn. App. 1 , 173 A.3d 984 (2017), is denied.

MULLINS, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
